meanings.definition: Not showy or ostentatious; modest or understated in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: She preferred an unshowy dress for the party, avoiding bright colors and flashy designs.
meanings.sent2: The room was decorated in an unshowy manner, with simple furniture and neutral tones.
meanings.sent3: His unshowy outfit made him blend in with the crowd, almost like a chameleon.
meanings.sent4: The unshowy performance of the actor left a lasting impact on the audience, despite its simplicity.
meanings.sent5: The unshowy beauty of the sunset painted the sky in soft hues of pink and orange.
